Author: distracted_tatertot
Text: Thank you for the kind words. I really appreciate it. I hate/love mirrors, and I can't help but look at myself in any sort of reflective surface multiple times throughout the way. I wish I could just be satisfied with where I'm at.  Here's to hoping yoga will bring us some peace of mind.

Author: moon--princess
Text: I feel you. I honestly think my mirror at home is skewed to make me look different. Sorry youre having a rough time but itll get better. I want to start yoga too.
